mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_account (openid, total_quota, surplus_quota, model_types, status, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{openid}, #{totalQuota}, #{surplusQuota}, #{modelTypes}, #{status}, now(), now())
mapper.update: UPDATE user_account SET surplus_quota = surplus_quota - 1 WHERE openid = #{openid} AND surplus_quota > 0 AND status = 0
UPDATE user_account SET total_quota = total_quota + #{totalQuota}, surplus_quota = surplus_quota + #{surplusQuota}, update_time = now() WHERE openid = #{openid}
